description.value:
Frequency once per minute

Requirements You're in Reflective Ripple Stance.

You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water. Make an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Trip]{Trip} each creature standing on the ground in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10].

These attacks all count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you make all the attacks.
